places.review: All is perfect! This restaurant have lovely interior design, great atmosphere, and modern ambience. Restaurant menu is complete, they have Indonesian and international cuisine. And the food taste is incredible. Reasonable price for the foods and beverages. Good, nice and responsive services.
recommended place to have a dinner. There's live music in saturday night. Service was pleasant. Price is not cheap, but worth it. Food range from 40k-180k IDR. Beverage from 18k-50k IDR.
A good place for a long talk with your long lost bestfriends. They serve cake, which I love the most. A bit too expensive for students but worth to try. Definitely will come back for cake!!

Are you looking for delicious healthy food? Come here! They serve many healthy food. How about the taste? Wow the taste is really good, delicious. They have good atmosphere too, have good spot in every corner for taking photos.

Super lovely place! The owner speaks proper English and is very welcoming. The terrace is very beautiful and the bathroom is clean. They have a surprisingly large assortment of coffee, and it tastes great!
